titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elisha Winkler.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Deborah A. Richards. 2006-03-30

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: This collection is in one folder and contains mid-year and final exam questions.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Interdepartmental Major in Comparative Literature at Smith College was established in 1968.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Department records, 1975 and 1977-78, contain materials describing exams given within the department. Types of materials include mid-year and final exam questions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Comparative Literature Program Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Comparative Literature Department records were created by the department and transfered to the College Archives.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: 52. English Languages and Literature Department records.
